# XmlFormatterBase.WriteNodes method

Write the provided nodes.

```csharp
protected void WriteNodes(XmlWriter writer, IEnumerable<XNode> nodes)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| writer | Your XmlWriter in the correct state |
| nodes | A collection of nodes |

## Remarks

For XElement nodes, [`WriteElement`](WriteElement.md) will be called to recursively apply your custom formatting policy.
